reassignCategory.title: Reassign Transactions
reassignCategory.description: This category has {count} transaction(s). Select a new category for "{categoryName}" transactions before deleting.

syncConfirmation.title: Sync Recently Completed
syncConfirmation.description: You synchronized your accounts {time} ago. Are you sure you want to sync again?

createPortfolio.title: Create Portfolio
createPortfolio.description: Create a new investment portfolio to track your holdings and transactions.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of this portfolio...

notifications.error: Failed to create portfolio. Please try again.

editPortfolio.title: Edit Portfolio
editPortfolio.description: Update name, type or description of your portfolio.

deletePortfolio.title: Delete Portfolio
deletePortfolio.description: Are you sure you want to delete this portfolio? This action cannot be undone.

refundRecordsList.noIncomeTransactions: There's no income transactions in the system that are not already marked as refunds. Create some to proceed
refundRecordsList.noExpenseTransactions: There's no expense transactions in the system that are not already marked as refunds. Create some to proceed
refundRecordsList.noTransactions: There's no transactions to select. Create some to proceed

splitDialog.title: Split into categories
splitDialog.description: Distribute this transaction across multiple categories. The main category keeps any unallocated amount.

errors.cannotUseMainCategory: Cannot use main category in splits

markAsRefund.selectRefundingTransaction: Select the original transaction that this entry is refunding.
markAsRefund.selectRefundedByTransactions: Select transactions which refund current entry.
markAsRefund.selectOnlyOne: * you can select only one transaction
markAsRefund.selectMultipleWithLimit: * you can select multiple transactions, but their total amount cannot be greater than the original transaction amount
markAsRefund.transactionSplitInfo: This transaction is split across multiple categories. Select which part you want to refund.
markAsRefund.amountTooSmallWarning: Options smaller than your refund amount
markAsRefund.amountMayBeSmaller: Some options may be smaller than your refund amount
markAsRefund.finalValidationWarning: Final validation will use converted amounts.

refundInfo.title: About Refund Transactions
refundInfo.description: This action links the current transaction [expense/income] as a refund to a previous existing transaction.

howItWorks.title: How it works:
howItWorks.expenseRefund: For an expense refund: Select the original income transaction.
howItWorks.incomeRefund: For an income refund: Select the original expense transaction.
howItWorks.noOriginal: You can mark any transaction as a refund even if there's no "original" transaction in the system. Useful in case you don't have account with the original transaction in the system.

benefits.title: Benefits:
benefits.accuracy: Enhances financial accuracy by adjusting spending or income statistics to exclude refunded amounts.
benefits.tracking: Helps track related transactions to improve your feed.

notes.title: Important Notes:
notes.recordKeeping: This link is for record-keeping purposes only.
notes.noBalanceAdjust: It does not adjust the balance of the original transaction in any way.
notes.canUnlink: You can always unlink transactions back.

examples.title: Examples:
examples.customerPayment: Refunding a customer payment: Create an expense and link it to the original income.
examples.vendorRefund: Receiving a refund from a vendor: Create an income and link it to the original expense.
examples.noOriginalTx: Recording a refund without an original transaction: Sometimes you might need to record a refund for a transaction that isn't in your system. For instance, if you're recording a refund for a cash payment that wasn't initially logged, you can still create a refund entry. This helps maintain accurate records even when the original transaction isn't digitally tracked.

transferRecordsList.noIncomeTransactions: No income transactions found. Try adjusting the filters.
transferRecordsList.noExpenseTransactions: No expense transactions found. Try adjusting the filters.
transferRecordsList.noTransactions: No transactions found. Try adjusting the filters.

portfolio.title: Transfer from Portfolio
portfolio.description: Transfer funds from this portfolio to another portfolio or account.

account.title: Transfer from Account
account.description: Transfer funds from this account to a portfolio.

deleteInvestmentTransaction.title: Delete Transaction
deleteInvestmentTransaction.description: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This action cannot be undone.

categoryForm.excludeFromStatsTooltip: Transactions in this category won't be counted in spending statistics and reports.

deleteDialog.title: Delete category?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete "{categoryName}". This action cannot be undone.

notifications.error: Unexpected error. Currency is not added.
